belongs_to_collection.name: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi no Video Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ28
overview: A collection of shivering psychic images received by general posts, "It really was! A video of the curse." Fear grows! Earthbound spirits, vengeful spirits, floating spirits, guardian spirits... It's full of mysterious images that can't be solved by science; including 'War ruins', 'IT bubble', 'Valley', 'Ghost path', 'earthquake', 'interview', and 'Passing celebration'.
tagline: Can you face the truth projected by the camera?
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video 28
